pullrequest.title: Model submission for X4 sensor config 2

content.raw:
Please copy a working example of `example.ign` over to this PR or apply the diff below:
```
diff -r 817ebc97f188 submitted_models/ssci_x4_sensor_config_6/launch/example.ign
--- a/submitted_models/ssci_x4_sensor_config_6/launch/example.ign	Thu Dec 12 09:37:54 2019 -0500
+++ b/submitted_models/ssci_x4_sensor_config_6/launch/example.ign	Thu Dec 12 12:16:45 2019 -0500
@@ -1,5 +1,5 @@
 <?xml version="1.0"?>
-<!-- Usage: ign launch preview.ign robotName:=<X1>
+<!-- Usage: ign launch path/to/example.ign robotName:=<X1>
 
    Parameters:
     robotName: Name to be assigned to model
@@ -10,7 +10,7 @@
 
   # Modify these as needed
   $enableGroundTruth = true
-  $headless = false
+  $headless =  local_variables.include?(:headless) ? :headless : false
 
 %>
 
@@ -23,6 +23,7 @@
   # This assumes that this launch file is in a directory below the model
   modelURI = File.expand_path("../", File.dirname(__FILE__))
   $worldName = 'example'
+  worldFile = File.join(File.expand_path("../worlds", File.dirname(__FILE__)), "#{$worldName}.sdf")
 
 %>
 
@@ -40,7 +41,7 @@
 
   <plugin name="ignition::launch::GazeboServer"
           filename="libignition-launch-gazebo.so">
-    <world_file>worlds/<%= $worldName %>.sdf</world_file>
+    <world_file><%= worldFile %></world_file>
     <run>true</run>
     <levels>false</levels>
     <record>
@@ -162,7 +163,8 @@
   </executable_wrapper>
   <%end%>
 
-<%= spawner(robotName, modelURI, $worldName, 0, 0) %>
+<%= spawner(robotName, modelURI, $worldName, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0) %>
+<%= rosExecutables(robotName, $worldName) %>
  
 </ignition>
 ```

Everything else looks good, can you please note that there is a RGBD camera attached to this model in the PR description?  Thank you, I'm going to go ahead and `approve` this for further validation from OSRF.  Please make the above changes.

Please copy a working example of example.ign over to this PR or apply the diff below: ``` diff -r 817ebc97f188 submitted_models/ssci_x4_sensor_config_6/launch/example.ign --- a/submitted_models/ssci_x4_sensor_config_6/launch/example.ign Thu Dec 12 09:37:54 2019 -0500 +++ b/submitted_models/ssci_x4_sensor_config_6/launch/example.ign Thu Dec 12 12:16:45 2019 -0500 @@ -1,5 +1,5 @@ <?xml version="1.0"?> -<!-- Usage: ign launch preview.ign robotName:=<X1> +<!-- Usage: ign launch path/to/example.ign robotName:=<X1>

Parameters:
 robotName: Name to be assigned to model

@@ -10,7 +10,7 @@

# Modify these as needed $enableGroundTruth = true - $headless = false + $headless = local_variables.include?(:headless) ? :headless : false

%>

@@ -23,6 +23,7 @@ # This assumes that this launch file is in a directory below the model modelURI = File.expand_path("../", File.dirname(FILE)) $worldName = 'example' + worldFile = File.join(File.expand_path("../worlds", File.dirname(FILE)), "#{$worldName}.sdf")

%>

@@ -40,7 +41,7 @@

<plugin name="ignition::launch::GazeboServer" filename="libignition-launch-gazebo.so"> - <world_file>worlds/<%= $worldName %>.sdf</world_file> + <world_file><%= worldFile %></world_file> <run>true</run> <levels>false</levels> <record> @@ -162,7 +163,8 @@ </executable_wrapper> <%end%>

-<%= spawner(robotName, modelURI, $worldName, 0, 0) %> +<%= spawner(robotName, modelURI, $worldName, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0) %> +<%= rosExecutables(robotName, $worldName) %>

</ignition> ```

Everything else looks good, can you please note that there is a RGBD camera attached to this model in the PR description? Thank you, I'm going to go ahead and approve this for further validation from OSRF. Please make the above changes.
